title: PERSON OF INTEREST - Soundtrack Guide II (Ramin Djawadi's Themes)
author: FringeMusic107
comment:
Thank you!  Thank you!  Thank you!

I've been looking forward to this for months! 

You do an awesome job at this! :)
Thanks for sharing dude. Love the seamless cut around the 2:36 to 2:40 mark!
It's official: Peter Collier's organisation has its very own theme. Did you notice it in last night's episode?
I've looking for the soundtracks from season 2, thanks for the video. By the way the official soundtrack of season 2 is coming in November.

0:06 Samantha Shaw
0:51 Leon Tao
1:24 Kara Stanton
2:17 Hersh (Reese's theme)
2:44 Jessica
4:17 Tragedy (Cal's death theme)
4:51 Finding Finch
5:23 Persons of interest
6:55 HR
7:17 Corruption (Fusco / HR)
8:16 Special Counsel (Danger)
description:
[please read]
At last, here's part 2 of your handy guide to all the various music themes from Person Of Interest! The score is composed by Ramin Djawadi. A part III is on its way. 
The themes for Kara Stanton, Jessica Arndt and HR are variations of Reese's first theme. Reese's theme is also used for Hersh; his government counterpart. A theme for the ''persons of interest'' that Reese and Finch protect every week was released on the season 1 soundtrack as ''Second Chance'' and ''Save Everybody''.
